screenshot

    1. Column names in header row (bold)
    1. Key columns (highlighted yellow)
    1. ‘<’/’>’ in header row indicate offscreen columns (dark blue)
    1. Current column (bold with inverse header)
    1. Overflowing cells truncated with ellipsis (…)
    1. Row cursor (inverse row)
    1. Selected rows (green)
    1. Sheet name and status line (lower left)
    1. Current cell at intersection of current row and current column
    1. Previously pressed keystrokes (lower right)
    1. Number of rows in sheet (lower right)

For developers¶

screenshot

    1. Column.name (c_Header)
    1. keyCols == columns[:nKeys] (c_KeyCols)
  • C. if leftVisibleColIndex > nKeys or rightVisibleColIndex < nVisibleCols-1, more non-hidden columns offscreen (ch_LeftMore/ch_RightMore)
  • onscreen columns: visibleCols[leftVisibleColIndex:rightVisibleColIndex+1]
    1. cursorCol == visibleCols[cursorVisibleColIndex] (c_CurCol)
    1. (ch_Ellipsis)
    1. cursorRow (c_CurRow)
    1. selectedRows (c_SelectedRow)
    1. name and previous status (c_StatusLine)
    1. cursorValue
    1. VisiData.keystrokes
    1. nRows
